title: Kensa Sloshing Machine

The Kensa Sloshing Machine shares its overall design with the Sloshing Machine. However, the Kensa Sloshing Machine is black with a white Toni Kensa logo on the side. The Toni Kensa signature red clothespin is attached to the ring of metal that sticks out from the inside part.

The Kensa Sloshing Machine was released on 3 October 2018 at 02:00 UTC. It comes with Fizzy Bombs and the Splashdown.

- The Kensa Sloshing Machine is a middleweight weapon.

- The matchmaking range is 147. The game's matchmaking system looks at a team's average matchmaking range value, and matches them against a team with a similar average.

- The ink consumption of 8.4% allows players to attack 11 times before needing to refill the ink supply.
This stat can be changed with Ink Saver (Main).

- When attacking from swim form, the first shot takes 18 frames to come out.

- The interval between firing and when the player is able to enter swim form or use a sub weapon is 20 frames.

- The interval at which the player can repeatedly swing is 34 frames.

The Kensa Sloshing Machine is a limited-edition, custom Slosher created in collaboration with Toni Kensa! Push your foes back with blasts from the Fizzy Bomb sub, then watch their colors run as you rinse and repeat with your Slosher main! If anyone's still standing after that, drop the hammer on 'em with the Splashdown special! This is a set for mischief makers who can't resist shaking the soda bottle before popping the top!
